  if(vecA.l!=vecB.l){
    ERROR_REPORT;
    std::cerr << "These two vectors can not make a sumation." << std::endl
              << "Your input was (" << vecA.l << ") + (" << vecB.l << ")." << std::endl;

  for(long i=0; i<vecA.l; i++){ vecA.array[i]+=vecB.array[i]; }
  
  vecB.destroy();
  return vecA;
}
